utility.name: Kali Linux Metapackage: kali-linux-pwtools
utility.author: Z. Cliffe Schreuders
utility.description: Installs a collection of software onto Kali. kali-linux-pwtools The kali-linux-pwtools metapackage contains over 40 different password cracking utilities as well as the GPU tools contained in kali-linux-gpu. Installation Size: 6.0 GB
